Plot: A teen gang in South London defend their block from an alien invasion.
Title: Attack the Block
Actors: Jodie Whittaker, John Boyega, Alex Esmail, Leeon Jones
tomatoConsensus: Effortlessly mixing scares, laughs, and social commentary, Attack the Block is a thrilling, brisky-paced sci-fi yarn with a distinctly British flavor.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 17 wins & 35 nominations.
